summary: This appears to be an email header from August 26, 2008, regarding Jeffrey Epstein, sent to Assistant U.S. Attorney Roy Black in West Palm Beach, Florida. It includes an attachment named 'Lefkowitz_080826001.pdf', suggesting legal or investigative correspondence.

keyFacts: An email regarding Jeffrey Epstein was sent to Assistant U.S. Attorney Roy Black on August 26, 2008.
The email included an attachment named 'Lefkowitz_080826001.pdf', which may contain relevant legal or investigative information.
The correspondence originates from or is directed to the U.S. Attorney's Office in West Palm Beach, Florida, a key jurisdiction in the Epstein case.
